class.name: Warden of the Wild
class.description: Guardians of nature, attuned to the elemental forces that shape the world.

trait.name: Elemental Attunement
trait.description: Choose an element (Earth, Fire, Water, or Air) and gain unique abilities and resistances.

trait.name: Wild Shape
trait.description: Transform parts of your body into your chosen element, becoming more attuned to the natural world.

trait.name: Nature's Guidance
trait.description: You have a deep connection to nature, granting you advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks.

trait.name: Elemental Mastery
trait.description: You gain the power to cast spells from the Druid spell list, harnessing the magic of the elements.

subclass.name: Earth Warden
subclass.description: Guardians of the deep earth, embodying resilience and steadfastness.

levelAbilities.ability: Earthen Resilience: Resistance to bludgeoning damage. Earth Meld: Bonus action, meld into the earth, become invisible until end of next turn, advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
Tremorsense: Sense vibrations in the ground within 30 feet, detect creatures/objects moving through solid earth.
Stone's Embrace: When hit by an attack, use reaction to reduce damage by 1d8 + proficiency bonus.
Stone Shape: Cast Stone Shape 1/long rest.

subclass.name: Fire Warden
subclass.description: With spirits ablaze, these wardens command the destructive and purifying power of fire.

levelAbilities.ability: Burning Aura: Resistance to fire damage. Fiery Burst: Bonus action, unleash fiery burst, dealing fire damage to creatures within 5 feet.
Ignite: Cast Produce Flame cantrip at will.
Burning Hands: Cast Burning Hands 1/long rest.
Flame Blade: Cast Flame Blade 1/long rest.

subclass.name: Water Warden
subclass.description: Adaptable and fluid, these wardens embody the ever-changing nature of water.

levelAbilities.ability: Fluid Form: Resistance to cold damage, swimming speed = walking speed. Water Breathing: Breathe underwater indefinitely.
Shape Water: Cast Shape Water cantrip at will.
Water Whip: Create a whip of water, dealing cold damage.
Water Walk: Cast Water Walk 1/long rest.

subclass.name: Air Warden
subclass.description: Free-spirited and swift, these wardens embody the untamed power of the wind.

levelAbilities.ability: Wind's Embrace: Flying speed = walking speed. Gust of Wind: Bonus action, create gust, push creatures/objects away.
Zephyr's Shield: Reaction, create a shield of air, +2 to AC against one ranged attack.
Feather Fall: Cast Feather Fall 1/long rest.
Call Lightning: Cast Call Lightning 1/long rest.
